title.rendered: PAMPER YOURSELF WITH THE GIFTS YOU REALLY WANT

content.rendered:
PAMPER YOURSELF WITH THE GIFTS YOU REALLY WANT!

With the Holidays coming to an end why not pamper yourself with beautiful lashes, relaxing candles, bold jewelry, and comfy designer slippers?

Feel beautiful and always ready for the day with full a-list lashes from D’Lashes. Also, save even more time with our new D’Lashes eyeliner pen that also doubles as lash glue.

Don’t forget to end the day and 2020 behind with a warm relaxing glow of calming candles. D’Lashes offers candles for every room in your home from black to white, to rose gold collection. Shop D’Lashes lashes here. 

Get comfy both outdoors and at home with this red matching velvet set with flared trousers from FWRD.COM. Bag, shoes, and earrings are all from Forward. Lashes are by yours truly D’Lashes.com. 

Also, I just want to mention especially during COVID how important to have hand sanitizers with you. I absolutely love these beautiful mist hand sanitizers from touchland that smell as good as they look.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!
